meanings.definition: A Hawaiian dish made with taro or breadfruit
meanings.sent1: The pupu at the luau was delicious.
meanings.sent2: She tried the pupu at the Hawaiian restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The pupu looked like little bites of heaven.
meanings.sent4: The pupu on the platter resembled colorful jewels.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the pupu filled the room, tempting everyone.

meanings.definition: Excrement, especially of a small animal
meanings.sent1: The dog left pupu on the grass.
meanings.sent2: She cleaned up the pupu in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: Oops! The pupu made a surprise appearance.
meanings.sent4: The pupu in the litter box needed to be scooped.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the pupu was not pleasant at all.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a young child or pet
meanings.sent3: The pupu wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The little pupu snuggled up for a nap.
meanings.sent5: Her pupu was the cutest in the litter.
